text: Mndewa wa Isilaeli nakamwidichila Yehoshafati, “Kabaha, nakapona munhu yumwe yawele kwa kukolela heye toweza kumuuza Mkulu Nguluwi, ila ndangumzudila kwa vila halingulavya uloli unojile kuwala heni, ila kangulavyaga uloli wihile hela. Mloli ayo ndo Mikaya, mwana wa Imula.” Yehoshafati nakedichila, “Mndewa halinguganigwa kulonga ahyo.”
